title: We’re Joined By Tim Schafer of Double Fine! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.30.24
description:
Sign up for the Kinda Funny Membership to get ad-free shows, live recordings, and daily Greg Miller vlogs. Patreon.com/KindaFunny or YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames

Blessing is joined by Tim Schafer of Double Fine to talk about Day of the Devs, Persona 3 Reload reviews, and Celeste 64!
